skills.name: FALSE ANGEL
desc: • Deals 3 hits of true damage to a single target.
• 20% Chance to Remove Beneficial Effects on each hit.
• The final hit Heals all allies based on your MAX HP.

skills.name: GHOST IN THE SNOW
desc: • Grants 100% Critical Strike Chance for 2 turns.

skills.name: SPECTER
desc: 30% Chance to gain Invincibility, Immunity, or Immortality for 1 turn upon taking damage.
